title: Model wife tells hitman feed my hubby's ex to the wood-chipper, prosecutors say
itunes:title: Model wife tells hitman feed my hubby's ex to the wood-chipper, prosecutors say
description:
Tara Lambert hated her husband's ex-wife so much that she allegedly wanted her murdered and ground up by a wood-chipper. The former model was found guilty in 2016 of trying to hire a hit man to do the deadly deed. That conviction was overturned because of a paperwork mistake, but Lambert is facing a second trial. Nancy Grace goes over the case defense lawyer Joel Brodsky, forensic expert Joseph Scott Morgan, psychologist Caryn Stark, and RadarOnline reporter Alexis Tereszcuk.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
